PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04722020-06-22,  ,  LAB,  ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations (COVID-19)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS (COVID-19) in order to avoid the termination of employment resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic, by giving employers more time to recall employees whose employment would otherwise have been terminated due to the duration of the lay-off.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0138 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
AttachmentsAttachment
